name: Stuck on Moon
description:
An exploration team that got stranded on the moon. Armed with ancient alien weapons, you must embark from the moon surface descending deeper into the moon’s levels which is for some reason, the only way out but also the worse way.

The game will try and aim for a dark theme, story driven aspects that reflect the challenges of survival shooter. Endless wave arena play style, with seamless level progression style to unlock more unique levels.
Game will consist of three levels, both with the endless survival option upon clearing, giving the players an edge to see how long they last per levels unique game aspects and mechanics.
Learning how to overcome hazards and handling the enemies will be the key to survival. Whether it be traversing the day and night cycle of the first level. Or surviving the darkest depths of the cave level, with limited vision and avoiding hazards in said darkness. Some changes may vary through these games effective development.
